subject: Dear friend
body:
Dear friend
I have only about a few months to live and I want you to Distribute my
funds to charities
if you will help reply me
yours truly
tsuneo takahashi

subject: Re: Dear friend
body:
Hello Tsuneo Takahashi,

I'm really sorry to hear about your situation. It's truly admirable that you're thinking of others and wanting to help charities in such a difficult time. 

Could you please tell me more about the charities you have in mind? I'd love to know more about them and how they've touched your life.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Mary
